name: MLP Android Config Editor
short_description:
The My Little Pony Android game from GameLoft hides characters needed to win the game behind a price tag of gems that can only be obtained by waiting 4+ years, buying gems through in app purchases, or cheating.
This is a program to help you cheat. It is provided without warranty, the developers are not responsible for damages caused, however unlikely.

Requires Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5. Available here http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=30653
summary: A way to edit the configuration of the GameLoft MLP Android Game
